song_lyrics: Sahaj swābhāvik prakṛuti kahīye, gātā suṇatā ati sukh lahīye. 1
Sahaj prakṛuti Shrī Dharma-Kuvarnī, harijannu man ati vashakarnī. 2
Dharyo nar-vigrah bhav-bhay-hārī, charitra kare ati mangaḷkārī. 3
Nitya swābhāvik cheṣhṭā gāvu, harijanne man het upajāvu. 4
Shrī Mahārāj niyam nitya rākhī, pāchhalī chār ghaḍī rāt rahe bākī. 5
Tyāre ūṭhī dātan kare sur-rāy, evo sahaj swabhāv sadāy. 6
Mukhaḍu loī rumāle Swamī, nhāvā padhāre Hari bahunāmī. 7
Nij kar kalashyo lai jaḷ ḍhoḷe, sevak jan te charaṇne choḷe. 8
Rūḍī rīte nāhīne Nāth, koru vastra laī nij hāth. 9
Sārī peṭhe sharīrne lu’ve, Premānand kahe jan sahu juve. 10
title: Sahaj swābhāvik prakṛuti kahīye

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1221: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
